name: Confirm area of work is accessible & acceptable to commence (If not comment below)
Setout & alignment as per drawing (include revision below)
Land shutter bracing props secured plumb shutter
Datum RL supplied by surveyor pour height marked
Steel tied & clear from Z bar holes
Leave a piece of AFS out every 6 m where a stock length of reo will lap in order to ensure horiztontal bars are tied, lap is maintained & compaction can be physically viewed at this point
Z bars secured wall straight & plumbed
Final sign off - Walls completed as per the above ITP - Add general photos/comments below
HOLDPOINT - Once all above items have been signed off work may proceed
